attributes.action: Punish the ilegal gun owners not the legal owners which seems to be going on
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To punish the people who use guns for crime and not the people who use guns for sport and are legal to own and use them it is always the people who own guns legaly that are the punished for other peoples crime

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
